s.text: The preamble to the final rule includes the full text of the final regulatory flexibility analysis.

Pursuant to section 801(a)(2)(A) of title 5, United States Code, this is our report on a major rule promulgated by Federal Communications Commission, entitled "Policies and Rules Concerning Children's Television Programming/Revision of Programming Policies for Television Broadcast Stations" (FCC 96-335; MM Docket No.

Pursuant to section 801(a)(2)(A) of title 5, United States Code, this is our report on a major rule promulgated by Federal Communications Commission, entitled "Policies and Rules Concerning Children's Television Programming/Revision of Programming Policies for Television Broadcast Stations" (FCC 96-335; MM Docket No.

Also, it states that the proposed rule has been designed to minimize the impact on small entities while retaining the benefits of encouraging television broadcast programming that satisfies the requirements of the Children's Television Act of 1990.
